title: Public cloud investment has plummeted in 2022
description: Report claims stock prices of publicly traded cloud companies have been decimated over the past 12 months.

title: iPhone owners can finally break a sweat without an Apple Watch – but there's one small catch
description: Fitness Plus expands support on October 24, but you'll need to download the iOS 16.1 update, first

title: IBM's new cloud solution promises huge storage gains at a low cost - with a catch
description: IBM claims its new air-gapped tape storage solutions offers superior security at a reduced cost.

title: This fake job offer scam will just infect your device with deadly malware
description: Job seekers warned about yet another fake job campaign, but the threat could be evolving into something worse.

title: Global smartphone sales fall again - could discounts be on the way?
description: Market downturn could force vendors to shift stock over Black Friday.

title: Google sued for collecting biometric data without consent
description: Google faces yet another lawsuit in Texas, this time over data gathered through Photos, Assistant, and Nest.

title: Microsoft Teams will finally shine focus on these often-neglected participants
description: Sign language popup windows and always-on captions should enhance Microsoft Teams accessibility.

title: House of Marley Solo is like a cheaper, better-looking, Bluetooth Sonos One
description: Want a Sonos One but made from consciously crafted, sustainable materials? See House of Marley’s bamboo wireless speaker, the Get Together Solo.

title: Many businesses still aren't offering properly collaborative offices
description: Microsoft study finds many offices have still not adapted since before the pandemic.

title: 7 new movies and TV shows on Netflix, Prime Video, HBO Max and more this weekend (October 21)
description: From all-new fantasy adventures to slow-burning psychological thrillers, there’s plenty to watch this weekend.

title: There's a major lack of qualified cybersecurity workers around
description: Security skills gap continues widening, with demand for qualified workers growing to 3.4 million jobs.

title: This AMD Ryzen 7000 CPU cooling trick is something you really shouldn’t try at home
description: Here’s one way to make an AMD Ryzen 7000 CPU run cooler – but don’t try it

title: Microsoft is taking on CCleaner to help your PC in a future Windows 11 update
description: A beta of PC Manager has appeared, giving you the option to remove files and stop apps from running all in one place.

title: Most of us really want connected cars to have proper security protection, White House finds
description: Consumers wish it was easier to learn how security-conscious IoT car manufacturers are.

title: Nintendo Switch Online is getting not one, but two Mario Party games next month
description: Nintendo Switch Online's a lively place to be in November, with the arrival of two Mario Party games.

title: Android 13 is coming to Windows 11 - but I still can't see a reason to use it
description: While Android apps have been available in Windows 11 for months, the lack of curation is ruining the experience.

title: Multicloud security issues are plaguing businesses everywhere
description: Multi-cloud is important, but difficult to provide security for, and businesses are craving better solutions and more visibility going forward.

title: Don't install the latest iOS update beta – it can break your iPhone's Face ID
description: If you update to the latest iOS 15 beta version you may find that your iPhone's Face ID stops working.

title: Samsung Galaxy S23 Ultra benchmark points to a top chipset but not enough RAM
description: A benchmark suggests the Samsung Galaxy S23 Ultra will use one of 2023's most powerful smartphone chipsets.

title: YouTube Premium just got its biggest price hike in years
description: Google is upping the price of a YouTube Premium family subscription from November.

title: Resident Evil 4 Remake is embracing its eccentric roots with open arms
description: Resident Evil 4 Remake might be darker in tone, but it hasn't forgotten the elements that made the original so special.

title: Intel Raptor Lake flagship CPU sets world record with astonishing 8.8GHz overclock
description: Exotic cooling was used, naturally, but this huge overclock is great news for anyone looking at a new 13th-gen processor.

title: Marvel's Fantastic Four might have found its Doctor Doom – and he'd be perfect
description: A noted industry insider claims Marvel met with a big Star Wars actor to play the fan favorite villain.

title: Oracle's new release wants to let all businesses become cloud providers
description: Make your business a cloud icon with Oracle Alloy's customization and control.

title: Exclusive: most people still reuse their passwords despite years of hacking
description: Password generators are being neglected, report finds.
